sleep.name: Sleep
sleep.description: Puts 2d4 HD of creatures to sleep. Affects lowest HD creatures first.

magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
magic_missile.description: Fires 1 missile (+1 per 2 levels after 1st). Each missile does 1d4+1 damage. Never misses.

protection_from_evil.name: Protection from Evil
protection_from_evil.description: Grants +2 to AC and saves against evil creatures. Prevents possession.

detect_magic.name: Detect Magic
detect_magic.description: Detects magical auras on objects and creatures.

burning_hands.name: Burning Hands
burning_hands.description: A cone of flame erupts from the caster's hands, dealing 1d3+1 damage per level of the caster.

charm_person.name: Charm Person
charm_person.description: Makes one person regard the caster as a trusted friend. Only works on humanoids.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: Creates an invisible barrier that grants AC 2 vs missiles, AC 4 vs other attacks.

light.name: Light
light.description: Creates a bright light like a torch. Can be cast on objects.

read_magic.name: Read Magic
read_magic.description: Allows caster to read magical writings and scrolls.

bless.name: Bless
bless.description: Allies gain +1 to attack rolls and morale saves.

command.name: Command
command.description: Give a one-word command that the target must obey (flee, halt, drop, etc).

detect_evil.name: Detect Evil
detect_evil.description: Detects evil intentions and evil creatures.

invisibility.name: Invisibility
invisibility.description: Target becomes invisible until they attack. Grants +4 to AC and surprise.

web.name: Web
web.description: Creates sticky webs that trap creatures. STR check to break free.

mirror_image.name: Mirror Image
mirror_image.description: Creates 1d4+1 illusory duplicates that confuse attackers.

knock.name: Knock
knock.description: Opens locked, barred, or wizard-locked doors.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.description: Target levitates up or down at 20 feet per round.

silence_15_radius.name: Silence 15' Radius
silence_15_radius.description: No sound can be made in the area. Prevents spellcasting.

spiritual_hammer.name: Spiritual Hammer
spiritual_hammer.description: Creates a magical hammer that attacks enemies, dealing 1d4+1 damage.

find_traps.name: Find Traps
find_traps.description: Reveals the presence of traps within range.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Explodes for 1d6 damage per caster level (max 10d6). Save for half.

lightning_bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning_bolt.description: A bolt of lightning strikes for 1d6 damage per caster level (max 10d6).

haste.name: Haste
haste.description: Targets move and attack at double speed.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: Target can fly at 120 feet per round with good maneuverability.

dispel_magic.name: Dispel Magic
dispel_magic.description: Negates magical effects. Chance based on caster level.

slow.name: Slow
slow.description: Targets move and attack at half speed.

neutralize_poison.name: Neutralize Poison
neutralize_poison.description: Removes poison from creature or object. Can revive recently poisoned creature.

cure_disease.name: Cure Disease
cure_disease.description: Cures any disease afflicting the target.

prayer.name: Prayer
prayer.description: Allies gain +1 to attack, damage, and saves. Enemies get -1.

remove_curse.name: Remove Curse
remove_curse.description: Removes one curse from creature or object.

protection_from_evil_10_radius.name: Protection from Evil 10' Radius
protection_from_evil_10_radius.description: As Protection from Evil, but affects all within 10 feet of caster.

create_water.name: Create Water
create_water.description: Generates 4 gallons of clean water per level of the caster. **Reverse:** *Destroy Water* obliterates a like quantity of water.

purify_food_drink.name: Purify Food & Drink
purify_food_drink.description: Makes up to 1 cubic foot of spoiled/poisoned food or water safe to consume. **Reverse:** *Putrefy Food & Drink* spoils safe food/water.

remove_fear.name: Remove Fear
remove_fear.description: Instills courage, granting a +4 bonus to saving throws against magical fear for 1 turn. If affected by fear, grants another save with a +1/level bonus. **Reverse:** *Cause Fear* causes a victim to flee in panic.

resist_cold.name: Resist Cold
resist_cold.description: Creature touched is inured to cold, receiving a +3 bonus to saving throws and taking half (or quarter on successful save) damage from greater cold attacks (e.g., *ice storm*, dragon breath).

sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
sanctuary.description: Opponents must make a saving throw vs. magic to strike or attack the protected cleric. Cleric cannot take offensive action while protected.

augury.name: Augury
augury.description: Seeks to divine whether a future action (within 3 turns) will be beneficial or harmful. Base chance of 70% success + 1%/level.

chant.name: Chant
chant.description: Gives a +1 bonus to attack rolls, damage, and saving throws for friendly creatures within a 3" radius for as long as the cleric chants. Enemy rolls are penalized by -1.

detect_charm.name: Detect Charm
detect_charm.description: Detects if a creature is under the influence of a *charm* spell (up to 10 creatures). **Reverse:** *Obscure Charm* protects a single creature from such detection.

know_alignment.name: Know Alignment
know_alignment.description: Reveals the exact alignment of up to 10 persons. **Reverse:** *Obscure Alignment* totally obscures the alignment of a single person for 1 turn.

resist_fire.name: Resist Fire
resist_fire.description: Creature touched is toughened to withstand heat, taking half (or quarter on successful save) damage from magical fires (e.g., *fireball*, dragon breath) and gaining a +3 bonus to saving throws vs. fire attacks.

slow_poison.name: Slow Poison
slow_poison.description: Greatly slows the effects of venom, temporarily saving a victim up to 10 turns previous to casting. Victim loses 1 HP per turn but never drops below 1 HP while the spell lasts.

snake_charm.name: Snake Charm
snake_charm.description: Causes one or more snakes to cease activity and sway hypnotically. Total hit points of snakes affected cannot exceed the cleric's level.

speak_with_animals.name: Speak With Animals
speak_with_animals.description: Enables the cleric to communicate with any warm or cold-blooded animal (not mindless). Lasts 2 rounds per level.

animate_dead.name: Animate Dead
animate_dead.description: Creates skeletons or zombies from dead human remains to obey the cleric's commands (1 monster/level).

continual_light.name: Continual Light
continual_light.description: Creates a bright, permanent light (daylight equivalent). **Reverse:** *Continual Darkness* creates a permanent, impenetrable darkness.

create_food_water.name: Create Food & Water
create_food_water.description: Creates 1 cubic foot of nourishing food and/or water per level, sustaining three human-sized creatures for a full day.

cure_blindness.name: Cure Blindness
cure_blindness.description: Permanently cures most forms of blindness by touch. **Reverse:** *Cause Blindness*.

feign_death.name: Feign Death
feign_death.description: Puts the touched creature into a cataleptic state, appearing dead.

glyph_of_warding.name: Glyph of Warding
glyph_of_warding.description: Inscribes a magical rune to guard an area (25 sq. ft. per level) which, when triggered, releases a stored effect (e.g., electrical damage, fire damage, paralyze).

locate_object.name: Locate Object
locate_object.description: Aids in locating a known or familiar object by direction. **Reverse:** *Obscure Object* hides an object from location spells.

speak_with_dead.name: Speak With Dead
speak_with_dead.description: Allows the cleric to ask several questions of a dead creature (body or remains must be present). Limits on questions and maximum time dead depend on cleric level.

word_of_recall.name: Word of Recall
word_of_recall.description: Instantly teleports the cleric back to his or her previously designated sanctuary, carrying additional weight (250 gp/level) in equipment, treasure, or persons.

animal_friendship.name: Animal Friendship
animal_friendship.description: Charms one animal (non-semi-intelligent) to be a trusted friend and ally of the druid (subject to save). Allows druid to teach it 3 "tricks"/INT point.

detect_snares_pits.name: Detect Snares & Pits
detect_snares_pits.description: Detects hidden snares and pits (simple traps only underground, all traps outdoors) in a 1" path up to 4" long.

entangle.name: Entangle
entangle.description: Causes plants (*grasses, weeds, trees*) in a 4" diameter area to wrap, twist, and entwine creatures, holding them fast or slowing movement by 50% (subject to save).

faerie_fire.name: Faerie Fire
faerie_fire.description: Outlines an object or creature with a pale glowing light, making it visible (even if invisible) and giving a +2 penalty to opponents' AC ("to hit" bonus).

invisibility_to_animals.name: Invisibility To Animals
invisibility_to_animals.description: Makes the recipient totally undetectable by normal animals (INT under 6).

locate_animals.name: Locate Animals
locate_animals.description: Determines the direction and distance of any desired type of animal within range.

pass_without_trace.name: Pass Without Trace
pass_without_trace.description: Recipient moves through any terrain without leaving footprint or scent, making tracking impossible.

predict_weather.name: Predict Weather
predict_weather.description: Gains 100% accurate knowledge of the weather trend (sky, temperature, precipitation) for 2 hours in advance per level of the caster in a 9 square mile area.

shillelagh.name: Shillelagh
shillelagh.description: Changes a normal oaken club into a magical +1 weapon, inflicting 2-8 HP (man-sized) or 2-5 HP (larger).

barkskin.name: Barkskin
barkskin.description: Improves the recipient creature's Armor Class by 1 point and grants a +1 bonus to saving throws versus all attack forms except magic.

charm_person_or_mammal.name: Charm Person Or Mammal
charm_person_or_mammal.description: Charms one person or mammal (not monster) to regard the druid as a trusted friend and ally (subject to save). Duration depends on the charmed creature's intelligence.

fire_trap.name: Fire Trap
fire_trap.description: Traps a closable object (e.g., door, chest) to explode with fire damage (1-4 HP, half with save) when opened/touched by an unauthorized creature.

heat_metal.name: Heat Metal
heat_metal.description: Causes ferrous metal (iron, steel) in a mass of 500 gp/level to become searing hot over 7 rounds, causing damage and disability to exposed flesh. **Reverse:** *Chill Metal* causes metal to become freezing, causing damage and amputation.

obscurement.name: Obscurement
obscurement.description: Causes a misty vapor to arise around the druid, reducing visibility to 2' to 8' (2d4) for 4 rounds per level.

produce_flame.name: Produce Flame
produce_flame.description: Creates a bright, hot flame in the druid's palm. Lasts 2 rounds/level. Can be hurled as a missile (range 4"), igniting combustibles.

trip.name: Trip
trip.description: Causes a stick, vine, or rope object to rise and trip creatures crossing it (subject to save). Creatures running take damage and are stunned.

warp_wood.name: Warp Wood
warp_wood.description: Permanently bends and warps wood in a 1" range/level, destroying its straightness, form, and strength.

call_lightning.name: Call Lightning
call_lightning.description: Calls down bolts of lightning from the sky (must be a storm) that inflict 2d8+1d8/level HP damage (half with save) to creatures within a 1" radius of the strike.

hold_animal.name: Hold Animal
hold_animal.description: Holds 1-4 animals rigid (mammals, birds, or reptiles, not monsters) for 2 rounds/level. Saving throw is penalized based on the number of targets.

plant_growth.name: Plant Growth
plant_growth.description: Causes normal vegetation (brush, trees, vines) in a 2" X 2" square area/level to become a dense barrier.

protection_from_fire.name: Protection From Fire
protection_from_fire.description: Grants invulnerability to normal fires and 50% damage reduction (+4 save bonus) against magical fires for 1 turn/level.

pyrotechnics.name: Pyrotechnics
pyrotechnics.description: Causes a fire source to produce either a flashing burst of fireworks (blinding creatures) or a thick stream of smoke (obscuring vision).

snare.name: Snare
snare.description: Creates a 90% undetectable snare from a flexible object (vine, rope) that contracts to bind or strangle a creature (1-6 HP damage) when triggered.

stone_shape.name: Stone Shape
stone_shape.description: Permanently forms an existing piece of stone (3 cubic feet/level) into a desired shape (e.g., weapon, trapdoor, idol).

summon_insects.name: Summon Insects
summon_insects.description: Attracts a cloud of flying or crawling insects (70% chance of flying) that swarm and attack a target, dealing 2 HP damage/round, and forcing the victim to fend them off.

tree.name: Tree
tree.description: Allows the druid to assume the form of a small living tree or shrub, or a large dead tree trunk, and observe their surroundings while in the form.

water_breathing.name: Water Breathing
water_breathing.description: Allows the recipient to freely breathe underwater for 6 turns/level. **Reverse:** *Air Breathing* allows water-breathing creatures to survive in the atmosphere.

affect_normal_fires.name: Affect Normal Fires
affect_normal_fires.description: Causes small fires (up to 3' diameter) to reduce in size/light (half consumption) or increase in size/light (double consumption). Heat output is unchanged.

comprehend_languages.name: Comprehend Languages
comprehend_languages.description: Allows the caster to read any incomprehensible written message (not magical writing) or understand the language of a speaking creature by touch.

dancing_lights.name: Dancing Lights
dancing_lights.description: Creates 1-4 lights resembling torches, spheres, or a vague man-like shape, that move as the caster desires.

enlarge.name: Enlarge
enlarge.description: Increases a living creature (up to 200% max) or object (up to 100% max) size and weight by 20% per level. **Reverse:** *Reduce* decreases size.

erase.name: Erase
erase.description: Removes writings (magical or mundane) from a scroll or two facing pages (50% base chance + 2%/level for magical, +4%/level for mundane).

feather_fall.name: Feather Fall
feather_fall.description: Instantly changes the rate of fall for creature(s)/objects to 2' per second (12' per segment), preventing damage on landing.

find_familiar.name: Find Familiar
find_familiar.description: Summons an abnormally intelligent animal familiar (e.g., cat, hawk, owl) to aid the magic-user.

friends.name: Friends
friends.description: Causes the magic-user to gain a temporary increase of 2-8 points in Charisma, or a temporary lowering of 1-4 points (subject to save by creatures in the area).

hold_portal.name: Hold Portal
hold_portal.description: Magically bars a door, gate, or valve for 1 round/level. Cannot be used on *wizard locked* doors.

identify.name: Identify
identify.description: Reveals 1 property of a touched magical item (requires pearl/owl feather component, and Constitution check upon use).

jump.name: Jump
jump.description: Empowers the recipient to leap up to 30' forward, 10' backward, or straight upward.

mending.name: Mending
mending.description: Repairs small breaks in non-magical objects (broken ring, hole in leather sack, etc.).

message.name: Message
message.description: Whispers a message to a pointed creature that can reply in a straight line.

nystul_s_magic_aura.name: Nystul's Magic Aura
nystul_s_magic_aura.description: Gives one item a false magical aura to fool *detect magic*.

push.name: Push
push.description: Causes an invisible force (1 foot-pound/level) to strike an object, moving small objects or causing a creature to lose its balance.

shocking_grasp.name: Shocking Grasp
shocking_grasp.description: Develops a powerful electrical charge in the caster's hand, inflicting 1-8 HP damage + 1 HP/level to the creature touched.

spider_climb.name: Spider Climb
spider_climb.description: Enables the recipient to climb and travel on vertical surfaces or ceilings at 3" movement rate.

tenser_s_floating_disc.name: Tenser's Floating Disc
tenser_s_floating_disc.description: Creates a 3' diameter, circular plane of null-gravity that holds 1,000 gp weight/level and follows the caster.

ventriloquism.name: Ventriloquism
ventriloquism.description: Makes the caster's voice (or similar sound) appear to issue from someplace else (another creature, statue, behind a door).

darkness_15_radius.name: Darkness, 15' Radius
darkness_15_radius.description: Creates a total, impenetrable darkness in a 15' radius sphere.

detect_invisibility.name: Detect Invisibility
detect_invisibility.description: Clearly sees any objects or creatures that are invisible (or astral, ethereal, hidden, or out of phase).

esp.name: ESP
esp.description: Detects the surface thoughts of any creature in range (except undead and those with no mind). Range and number of probes increase with level.

fools_gold.name: Fools Gold
fools_gold.description: Temporarily changes copper coins to gold pieces, or brass items to solid gold. Chance of cold-wrought iron dispelling the dweomer (25-30% base chance).

forget.name: Forget
forget.description: Causes 1-4 individual creatures within a 2" X 2" area to forget the events of the previous round.

leomund_s_trap.name: Leomund's Trap
leomund_s_trap.description: Places a false trap illusion upon a small mechanism (lock, hinge) designed to fool dwarves and thieves (80% likely to be seen).

magic_mouth.name: Magic Mouth
magic_mouth.description: Empowers an object (not living/intelligent) with an enchanted mouth that speaks a 25-word message when a specified event occurs.

misdirection.name: Misdirection
misdirection.description: Misdirects the information from a detection-type spell (e.g., *detect magic, detect evil*) about a specific creature or item.

phantasmal_force.name: Phantasmal Force
phantasmal_force.description: Creates a visual illusion of an object, creature, or force (4 square" + 1 square"/level). Creatures believe it and can suffer damage until they successfully disbelieve.

ray_of_enfeeblement.name: Ray Of Enfeeblement
ray_of_enfeeblement.description: Weakens an opponent, reducing Strength by 25% + 2%/level (subject to save).

rope_trick.name: Rope Trick
rope_trick.description: Causes one end of a 5'-30' rope to rise into the air and anchor in an extra-dimensional space, allowing the caster and up to five others to climb to safety.

scare.name: Scare
scare.description: Causes a creature with < 6+1 HD/levels to fall into a fit of trembling and shaking (subject to save).

shatter.name: Shatter
shatter.description: Shivers non-magical objects of crystal, glass, ceramic, or porcelain (up to 100 gp/level) into dozens of pieces.

stinking_cloud.name: Stinking Cloud
stinking_cloud.description: Creates a billowing cloud of nauseous vapors (2" X 2" X 2" cloud) that causes creatures to be helpless due to nausea (or half helpless on successful save).

strength.name: Strength
strength.description: Increases a creature's Strength ability score (1-6 points or 1-8 tenths of 18) for 6 turns/level.

blink.name: Blink
blink.description: Causes the caster's material form to "blink" out and back to the plane in a random period/direction each round. Caster is only 75% likely to perform other actions during this spell.

clairaudience.name: Clairaudience
clairaudience.description: Allows the caster to concentrate on a known locale and hear in their mind whatever noise is within a 6" radius of that locale center.

clairvoyance.name: Clairvoyance
clairvoyance.description: Allows the caster to see in their mind whatever is within sight range (normal or infrared/ultraviolet) of a known locale.

explosive_runes.name: Explosive Runes
explosive_runes.description: Traces mystic runes on a book/map/scroll that prevent unauthorized reading. When read, the runes detonate, dealing 12-30 (6d4+6) HP damage (no save).

flame_arrow.name: Flame Arrow
flame_arrow.description: Touches one arrow or crossbow bolt (quarrel) per segment, making it magical and causing +1 HP additional fire damage on a successful hit.

gust_of_wind.name: Gust Of Wind
gust_of_wind.description: Creates a strong puff of air (1" wide path, 1"/level long) that extinguishes small flames, fans large fires, forces back small flying creatures, and slows large flying creatures by 50%.

infravision.name: Infravision
infravision.description: Enables the recipient to see in the infrared spectrum up to 60' (lasts 12 turns + 6 turns/level).

invisibility_10_radius.name: Invisibility, 10' Radius
invisibility_10_radius.description: Makes the creature touched and all its gear within a 10' radius invisible.

leomund_s_tiny_hut.name: Leomund's Tiny Hut
leomund_s_tiny_hut.description: Creates an opaque sphere of force (10' diameter, half above/half below ground) that maintains 70°F inside temperature and withstands up to 50 mph winds.

monster_summoning_i.name: Monster Summoning I
monster_summoning_i.description: Summons 1-4 first level monsters to attack the caster's opponents (lasts 2 rounds + 1 round/level).

protection_from_normal_missiles.name: Protection From Normal Missiles
protection_from_normal_missiles.description: Bestows total invulnerability to hurled and projected missiles (arrows, axes, darts, etc.) and reduces damage from large/magical missiles.

suggestion.name: Suggestion
suggestion.description: Influences the actions of one creature by uttering a few words suggesting a reasonable course of action (lasts 6 turns + 6 turns/level).

tongues.name: Tongues
tongues.description: Enables the caster to speak the language of any creature (same as Cleric 4th Level).

audible_glamer.name: Audible Glamer
audible_glamer.description: Creates a volume of sound (talking, singing, roaring, etc.) at whatever range the caster desires (up to a dragon's roar).

change_self.name: Change Self
change_self.description: Alters the appearance of the illusionist's form, including clothing and equipment, to any generally man-shaped bipedal creature.

color_spray.name: Color Spray
color_spray.description: Causes a vivid, fan-shaped spray of colors that affects 1-6 creatures, potentially rendering them unconscious, blinded, or stunned, based on their HD/level.

gaze_reflection.name: Gaze Reflection
gaze_reflection.description: Creates a mirror-like area of air that reflects back any gaze attack (e.g., basilisk, medusa) upon the gazer.

wall_of_fog.name: Wall Of Fog
wall_of_fog.description: Creates a wall of misty vapors that obscures all sight (normal or infravision) beyond 2'.

blindness.name: Blindness
blindness.description: Causes the recipient creature to become totally blind (no cure except *dispel magic* or caster's will).

blur.name: Blur
blur.description: Causes the outline of the illusionist's form to become blurred, shifting, and wavery, penalizing missile and melee attacks against them.

hypnotic_pattern.name: Hypnotic Pattern
hypnotic_pattern.description: Creates a weaving, turning pattern of subtle colors that causes creatures looking at it to become fascinated and entranced (up to 24 HD/levels total).

improved_phantasmal_force.name: Improved Phantasmal Force
improved_phantasmal_force.description: A phantasmal force illusion that can be maintained with minimal concentration (lasts 2 rounds after concentration ceases).

dispel_illusion.name: Dispel Illusion
dispel_illusion.description: Dispels any *phantasmal force* (with or without audible glamer) cast by a non-illusionist, and has a chance to dispel other illusionist spells.

illusionary_script.name: Illusionary Script
illusionary_script.description: Creates illusionary script on paper/parchment that can only be read by the person(s) the illusionist desires (others become confused).

paralyzation.name: Paralyzation
paralyzation.description: Creates illusionary muscle slowdown that paralyzes creatures whose total HD do not exceed twice the illusionist's level.

spectral_force.name: Spectral Force
spectral_force.description: Creates an illusion that includes sound, smell, and thermal illusions.
